description: The table stores information about reference documents that were printed from clinical references activity.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CLIN_REF_DOCS
columns.description: Stores the unique identifiers for the Clinical References documents that are either added to patient instructions or printed from the document preview tab of Clinical References activity.

columns.name: REF_DOCS_ETX_ID
columns.description: Stores the SmartText IDs of the Clinical References documents that are either added to patient instructions or printed from the document preview tab of the Clinical References activity.

columns.name: REF_DOCS_ETX_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: REF_DOCS_ETX_DAT
columns.description: This item stores the contact date (DAT) of the SmartText for the patient's Clinical Reference documents (I EPT 17282).

columns.name: REF_DOC_SUGGES_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when a suggested document was either added to Patient Instructions or was printed from the document preview tab of the Clinical References activity.

columns.name: REF_DOC_PRINT_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant when a suggested document was printed either from Patient Instructions or from the document preview tab of the Clinical References activity.

columns.name: CLIN_REF_DOCS_TITLE
columns.description: Stores the display names for the Clinical References documents that are either added to patient instructions or printed from the document preview tab of Clinical References activity.

columns.name: REF_DOC_PRINT_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user EMP ID who has printed the clinical reference document.
